Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Jackson/Ashland
ShortDescription: Eastbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Ashland, Congress, Loomis and Jackson due to street blockage near Jackson/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Ashland, Congress, Loomis and Jackson due to street blockage near Jackson/Ashland.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Eastbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Ridgeland, 26th, Harlem and Cermak, due to street blockage near Cermak/Harlem.

Headline: Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier police activity at Main. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier police activity at Main.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Homan/Huron
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Franklin, Kinzie, Chicago and Homan due to, street blockage near Homan/Huron.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Homan, Franklin, Kinzie, Chicago and Homan due to, street blockage near Homan/Huron.

Allow extra travel time.
